meanings.definition: A long, many-legged invertebrate that moves slowly and feeds on decaying plant matter.
meanings.sent1: I saw a millipede crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The millipede in the garden was moving very slowly.
meanings.sent3: The millipede decided to have a feast on the fallen leaves.
meanings.sent4: The millipede's pace was as leisurely as a stroll in the park.
meanings.sent5: The millipede's numerous legs made it look like a tiny centipede.

meanings.definition: A small, cylindrical arthropod with numerous legs, each segment having two pairs.
meanings.sent1: The millipede curled up into a ball when disturbed.
meanings.sent2: I found a millipede under a rock in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The millipede's tiny legs were like little brushes sweeping the ground.
meanings.sent4: The millipede's body resembled a tiny train with many carriages.
meanings.sent5: The millipede's legs moved in perfect synchrony as it explored its surroundings.
